accounts.name: signingAuthority
docs: The alternative is to create an empty SigningAuthority struct that can be passed to Account<>

fields.name: amountWithdrawn
docs: The principal amount withdrawn from deal token account by borrower

fields.name: maxFundingDuration
docs: The number of days after tranche investors can call burn tranches if the deal does not goes live.

fields.name: performanceFeePercentage
docs: Percentage of the interest share taken as the fees [asset manager fees + credix fees]

fields.name: gracePeriod
docs: The number of days after the due date that no late fees are applied

fields.name: serviceFeePercentage
docs: The percentage of the outstanding principal that is charged as an annual fee, going to the asset managers treasury (+ credix treasury)

fields.name: yearLatestServiceFeesCharged
docs: Used to keep track of the year service fee is charged for.

fields.name: migrated
docs: true when we bring off chain deal onchain.

fields.name: originalGoLiveAt
docs: When upscaling we store the `go_live_at` timestamp here and reset `go_live_at`.
We do this so the deal is no longer regarded as in progress, requiring a new activation.
Across all upscales, the initial point of activation should always be regarded as the `go_live_at` so we need to be able to restore it.

fields.name: poolOutstandingCredit
docs: The amount from senior tranche lent

fields.name: performanceFee
docs: The percentage of interest share collected as fees[asset manager fees + credix share]

fields.name: withdrawalFee
docs: The fee charged for withdrawals

fields.name: gracePeriod
docs: The number of days after the due date that no late fees are applied

fields.name: credixPerformanceFeePercentage
docs: The percentage of the credix_performance_fee_percentage going to the Credix treasury

fields.name: credixServiceFeePercentage
docs: The percentage of the service_fee going to the Credix treasury

fields.name: poolSizeLimitPercentage
docs: Maximum possible deposit limit in addition the pool outstanding credit
pool_size_limit = pool_outstanding_credit + pool_size_limit_percentage * pool_outstanding_credit

fields.name: credixPerformanceFeePercentage
docs: Percentage of the interest share taken as the fees [asset manager fees + credix fees]

fields.name: credixServiceFeePercentage
docs: Percentage of credix share in the performance fees

fields.name: deposits
docs: The legacy deposits are not added to this vec.

fields.name: claimBaseAmount
docs: base amount deposited

fields.name: padding
docs: Reserved size for extra fields

errors.name: UnauthorizedSigner
errors.msg: The Signer is not authorized to use this instruction.

errors.name: CredixPassInvalid
errors.msg: Credix pass is invalid for this request.

errors.name: CredixPassInactive
errors.msg: Credix pass is inactive at the moment.

errors.name: NotEnoughBaseTokens
errors.msg: Not enough Base tokens.

errors.name: MarketIsFrozen
errors.msg: This market is currently frozen. Please try again later.

errors.msg: Invalid Borrower Token Account.

errors.msg: Invalid Investor Token Account.

errors.name: InvalidMintAccount
errors.msg: Invalid mint Account.

errors.name: InvalidTreasuryAccount
errors.msg: Invalid treasury Account for this market.

errors.name: WithdrawalsLocked
errors.msg: Not yet possible to withdraw funds.

errors.name: TotalTrancheSizeNotOne
errors.msg: Total tranche size should be one.

errors.name: TotalTrancheReturnsNotOne
errors.msg: Total tranche returns should be one.

errors.name: InvalidTrancheSizeOrReturns
errors.msg: A tranche with a size should have a value for its returns and vice versa.

errors.name: InvalidTrancheIndex
errors.msg: There is no tranche in the deal with the provided index.

errors.name: DealNotOpen
errors.msg: This deal is not open for funding yet.

errors.name: TranchePassInactive
errors.msg: Tranche pass is inactive at the moment.

errors.name: InvalidInstructionDepositTranche
errors.msg: Deposit Tranche instruction doesn't exist for senior tranche(index=1).

errors.name: NotEnoughTokens
errors.msg: Not enough tokens

errors.name: DealNotOpenForActivation
errors.msg: A deal can only be activated once all tranches(except for the senior tranche at index 1) have been filled.

errors.name: DealNotInProgress
errors.msg: Deal not in progress

errors.name: DealNotOpenForFunding
errors.msg: Deal not open for funding

errors.name: InvalidDealTokenAccount
errors.msg: Invalid deal token account.

errors.name: DealNotOpenForBurningTranches
errors.msg: Deal not open for burning tranches

errors.name: InvalidSeniorTrancheInstruction
errors.msg: This instruction is invalid for senior tranche.

errors.name: RepaymentPeriodsMissing
errors.msg: Repayment periods not fully set

errors.name: DealTrancheWithdrawalClosed
errors.msg: Deal not open for tranche withdrawal

errors.name: DealNotPending
errors.msg: Deal is not pending

errors.name: RepaymentPeriodsAlreadySet
errors.msg: Repayment periods already set

errors.name: TotalPeriodsExceeded
errors.msg: Total periods exceeded

errors.name: InvalidRepaymentSchedule
errors.msg: Invalid repayment schedule

errors.name: WrongAmountTrancheConfigs
errors.msg: Wrong number of tranche configs: expected 10

errors.name: TrancheFunded
errors.msg: Tranche already funded

errors.name: TransferSafeguard
errors.msg: Transfer safeguard

errors.name: MaxManagersExceeded
errors.msg: Too many managers specified. Max: 10

errors.name: MaxPassIssuersExceeded
errors.msg: Too many pass issuers specified. Max: 5

errors.name: InvalidPassInstructionSigner
errors.msg: The signer does not have permission to issue passes.

errors.name: BaseDepositLimitExceeded
errors.msg: The max deposit amount limit reached. Please try again later.

errors.name: DaysInYearPeriodDurationRest
errors.msg: Days in year is not a multiple of period duration

errors.name: MintNotOwnedByCredix
errors.msg: The passed mint account is not initialized by credix program or does not have a freeze authority.

errors.name: InvalidMigrateDealInstruction
errors.msg: This instruction is not valid for a migrated deal.

errors.name: PeriodDurationIsZero
errors.msg: Period duration is zero

errors.name: MigrateDealInstruction
errors.msg: This instruction is only for migrated deals.

errors.name: DuplicateTrancheClaimsInvestors
errors.msg: Tranche claim configs 2 or more claims with same investor and tranche index.

errors.name: DuplicateLpClaimsInvestor
errors.msg: Lp claim configs contains 2 or more claims with same investor.

errors.name: TrancheClaimForSeniorTranche
errors.msg: Tranche claim data invalid provide tranche claims for senior tranche, Use lp claims instead.

errors.name: TrancheClaimAmountInvalid
errors.msg: Tranche claims base amounts don't add up to the tranche size.

errors.name: DealNotOpenForClaims
errors.msg: This migrated deal hasn't been activated yet. It is not open for claims

errors.name: TrancheClaimIndexOutOfBounds
errors.msg: The tranche claim index is greater then tranche claims length.

errors.name: TrancheClaimInvalidInvestor
errors.msg: The tranche claim index provided belongs to other investor.

errors.name: TrancheClaimInvalidIndex
errors.msg: The tranche claim index provided belongs to other tranche index.

errors.name: LpClaimIndexOutOfBounds
errors.msg: The tranche claim index is greater then tranche claims length.

errors.name: LpClaimInvestorInvalid
errors.msg: The lp claim index provided belongs to other investor.

errors.name: ModifyingRepaidPeriods
errors.msg: Can not modify partially repaid periods.

errors.name: DealPrincipalModified
errors.msg: Can not modify total principal expected in the repayment schedule.

errors.name: StructuringDealForbidden
errors.msg: Deal should pending or structuring to (re)set the repayment schedule

errors.name: RepaymentScheduleMissing
errors.msg: Repayment schedule is required for sell order with tranche token

errors.name: DealMissing
errors.msg: Deal is required for sell order with tranche token

errors.name: TranchePassMissing
errors.msg: Tranche Pass is required for sell order with tranche token

errors.name: DealTranchesMissing
errors.msg: Deal Tranches is required for sell order with tranche token

errors.name: SellerTrancheMissing
errors.msg: Seller Tranche is required for sell order with tranche token

errors.name: WrongAmountTrancheUpscaleConfigs
errors.msg: Wrong number upscale of tranche configs: expected 10

errors.name: MissingTrancheInfoAccount
errors.msg: The instruction expected tranche info account: Found None

errors.name: RepaymentPeriodNotFound
errors.msg: Repayment period index not found

errors.name: TrancheRepaymentMissing
errors.msg: Tranche repayments missing, Can not adjusts tranches.
